description: Bobbi is back!! We all loved her the first time around and I fell in love all over again during this visit. I’m always a little tougher on a model the second time we meet and this shoot proves that fact very well. I exposed her cage phobia with the Houdini tank. Her fear is quite apparent throughout the scene. Then I gagged her with a chain on the chain web. In scene three I pushed Bobbi’s limits with an extremely tight electrical tape tie in the curved tank. In the process I found out she was ticklish! Her underwater struggling while being tickled is hot! In the last scene she was vulnerable to more tickling, so of course I had to indulge myself again. Her helpless struggles in this scene are quite a turn-on. As a reward for her giving nature, Wet Dreams thanked Bobbi for me with a couple of beautiful orgasms. I can hardly wait for round three with Bobbi Starr.
title: Bobbi Starr
